name: @gamely/love-engine
author: RodrigoDornelles
description: Game Engine written in 100% lua that runs in a vacuum.

scripts.build: rm -Rf dist;mkdir -p dist/dist;cp src/main.lua dist/dist;cp package.json dist;cp README.md dist
scripts.build-win: if exist dist (rmdir /s /q dist) && mkdir dist\dist && copy src\main.lua dist\dist && copy package.json dist && copy README.md dist
